content.rendered:
We're hiring!  If you've ever dreamed of being a raft guide or just always wished that free rafting trips were a job perk, now's the time to apply.  With winter seasonal employment coming to an end, we're hoping to meet some awesome new staff members over the next month.

AVA's Colorado Rafting has four locations currently seeking employees.

Breckenridge

Our Breckenridge outpost is home to our sales office and we are seeking enthusiastic, fun people who want to talk to our guests all day long about rafting.  We are hiring for seasonal positions with a potential for year-round employment.

Granite

Our Granite outpost is home to our Arkansas River staff, and we are seeking rookie raft/ zipline guides for guide school, experienced raft guides, , and retail staff members for summer employment.

Idaho Springs

Our Idaho Springs outpost is home to our Clear Creek staff, and we are seeking rookie and experienced raft guides and zipline guides, and retail staff for the summer.

Kremmling

Our Kremmling outpost is home to our Colorado River staff, and we are seeking rookie and experienced raft guides.

We hope you'll join us for a fantastic summer!
